languages.text: "Я бы, может, и ответил тебе, вот только..." {n}Он оскаливается, демонстрируя инкрустированные перламутром зубы.{/n} "Нет смысла говорить с мертвецами".
"Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."
languages.original_text: "Я бы, может, и ответил тебе, вот только..." {n}Он оскаливается, демонстрируя инкрустированные перламутром зубы.{/n} "Нет смысла говорить с мертвецами".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying his teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."
"Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying his teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

"Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."
"Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

languages.text: «Oh, me encantaría explicártelo, pero...». {n}Sonríe, mostrando sus dientes con incrustaciones de madreperla.{/n} «No tiene mucho sentido hablar con cadáveres».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, me encantaría explicártelo, pero...». {n}Sonríe, mostrando sus dientes con incrustaciones de madreperla.{/n} «No tiene mucho sentido hablar con cadáveres».

languages.text: “噢，我倒是愿意和你多说说，只不过……”{n}他微笑起来，露出了镶着珍珠的牙齿。{/n}“和死人说话毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我倒是愿意和你多说说，只不过……”{n}他微笑起来，露出了镶着珍珠的牙齿。{/n}“和死人说话毫无意义。”

languages.text: « Oh, j'adorerais vous le dire, mais... {n}Il sourit, affichant une rangée de dents serties de nacre.{/n} À quoi bon discuter avec un cadavre ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, j'adorerais vous le dire, mais... {n}Il sourit, affichant une rangée de dents serties de nacre.{/n} À quoi bon discuter avec un cadavre ? »

languages.text: 「あー、教えてあげたいところだが…」{n}彼は笑い、真珠で飾られた歯を見せる。{/n}「死体と話しても意味はない」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: 「あー、教えてあげたいところだが…」{n}彼は笑い、真珠で飾られた歯を見せる。{/n}「死体と話しても意味はない」

languages.text: "Detaylıca açıklamayı çok isterdim ama..." {n}Gülümseyerek inci gibi olan kaplamalı dişlerini sergiliyor.{/n} "Cesetlere laf anlatmanın pek bir anlamı yok."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: "Detaylıca açıklamayı çok isterdim ama..." {n}Gülümseyerek inci gibi olan kaplamalı dişlerini sergiliyor.{/n} "Cesetlere laf anlatmanın pek bir anlamı yok."

languages.text: "Oh, ich würde Euch gerne alles erzählen, aber ..." {n}Er entblößt lächelnd seine mit Perlmutt verzierten Zähne.{/n} "Es macht keinen Sinn, mit Toten zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I would love to tell you, except..." {n}He smiles, displaying teeth inset with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "There is no point in talking to corpses."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ich würde Euch gerne alles erzählen, aber ..." {n}Er entblößt lächelnd seine mit Perlmutt verzierten Zähne.{/n} "Es macht keinen Sinn, mit Toten zu sprechen."
